conclusion: Determine the relationship between electric power P and 15W.
Calculate the voltage U across the circuit when the switch is open.
The current I_0 = 0.5A flows through the circuit with total resistance R_1 = 20Ω.
Using Ohm's Law, U = I_0 × R_1 = 10V.
Determine the total resistance when the switch is closed.
Motor M with internal resistance R_2 = 10Ω is added in parallel with R_1.
Calculate equivalent resistance R_eq of the parallel combination: R_eq = 6.67Ω.
Calculate the current I when the switch is closed.
Using Ohm's Law, I = U / R_eq = 1.5A.
Calculate the power P consumed by the circuit.
The power P consumed by the circuit is exactly 15W.
Relationship between electric power P and 15W is P = 15W.
